title: varamonru tandaruLvAi vaDivElA
sahitya:
vAri vihAri yamunA parivrta gOpi jana 
manOllAsa paTu tara shObitha mukha mandhahAsa


anupallavi

  nAri pIryuta rAsa mahOtsava naTanA yAsa mapOhi tumhiva
			(madhyamakAla)
murAri mrdhu sundara mOhana mukuLee krta
nava cAruci kanDaka samyuta kuntala nIla mEgha sharIri.


caraNam    tAra gandharva suragIya mAna tapana sudhA abimAna
sArasa kisalaya sajala samAna taruNI pIryuta parishIrsha mAna murAri
